[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#e0e0e0″ border_width_right_tablet=”0px” border_width_right_phone=”” border_width_right_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0065a4″ text_font_size=”60px” min_height=”60px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

1

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”65px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Week of Vacation After Six
Months of Service†

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#e0e0e0″ border_width_right_tablet=”0px” border_width_right_phone=”” border_width_right_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0065a4″ text_font_size=”60px” min_height=”60px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||1px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”29px||29px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

2

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”65px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Weeks of Vacation After
One Year of Service†

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0065a4″ text_font_size=”60px” min_height=”60px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

$22K

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”65px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Healthcare Benefits

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#e0e0e0″ border_width_right_tablet=”0px” border_width_right_phone=”” border_width_right_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0065a4″ text_font_size=”60px” min_height=”60px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

2.5%

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”65px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

401(k) Match After
One Year of Service

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#e0e0e0″ border_width_right_tablet=”” border_width_right_phone=”0px” border_width_right_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0065a4″ text_font_size=”60px” min_height=”60px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

100%

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”65px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Company-Funded
Profit-Sharing Plan

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#0065a4″ text_font_size=”60px” min_height=”60px” custom_margin=”||5px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

2025

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”65px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Year Dot Plans to Have Family
Health Centers at All DC Locations

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/DotTruckDTI.png” alt=”Dot Truck” title_text=”Dot Truck” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”44%” width_tablet=”85%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-75px|auto||auto||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”12px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

*Not all schedule types are available at all locations. Reach out to your local DC for more information.

**Drivers are not guaranteed to be home on holidays. They will receive paid holiday pay whether they are at home or on the road. Holiday pay eligibility varies by driver schedule type. Reach out to your local DC for more information.

†Paid time off and vacation time amounts vary based on driver schedule type. Please reach out to your local DC for more information.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#d8d8d8″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-bottom” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”off|desktop” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordti.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/07/share_family_570x427.jpg” alt=”DTI Drivers” _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Share with Someone

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Want to share this with your family and friends, or save this info for later? Send them the link to this page or share a PDF with them via email:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

"*" indicates required fields

Name*

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#d8d8d8″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||19px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Apply Now

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.6″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Drive with Dot and discover your forever career. Or need more information before you apply? We’d love to talk to you.
